reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: F.a: WARO office PMER support for the Regional Programme

description.narrative: The presence of FCA in programme countries Liberia and Sierra Leone contributes to the achievement of country programme objectives and enables FCA to become an active development partner with local civil society organisations, the Governments and internati onal community. Field precence ensures relevance, efficiency, effectiveness, quality and impact of FCA?s Country Programmes in the FCA thematic areas as well as humanitarian and advocacy work, and enables coordination and cooperation with local and interna tional partners and stakeholders.The main objective:Strategic and operational planning, programme and project level PME and administrative support, provision of thematic advice to the country programmes and projects, further strengthening of the management and administration of the Country Offices, resourcing and staffing of the Country Offices, building the capacity of the programme and support staff to deliver quality service to clients, improved dialogue with authorities and various actors, networking an d coordination with other aid organisations, cooperation with other stakeholders, ensuring support and input for communication purposes. Expected results:Country Programmes are planned, monitored and evaluated with the highest international stardards, part ners and beneficiaries are involved and participate in PME processes and thematic advice is provided to implementing partners, Country Programmes are implemented in coordination and cooperation with local and international stakeholders, input of partner or ganisations and topics from the region are included in the lobbying and advocacy work and development communicationPartners:Local and international NGOs, Governments, International Organisations
